internationalizations.description:
擁有十年以上專案管理、技術寫作與系統開發經驗，曾負責 Louis Vuitton、TITAN 等國際品牌專案，也曾於 IBM 參與流程管理、內部系統工具開發與管理文件撰寫，專精於流程優化、數位轉型與資源整合，持續協助團隊實現並超越目標。我具備 Python 程式設計、TOEIC 金色證書、Steinberg 認證音樂製作人、丙級中餐烹調技術士與 PADI 開放水域潛水員等多項證照，結合技術深度、創意與生活熱情。目前正積極取得 AWS 雲端相關認證，持續拓展專業能力。

除了本業之外，我創辦 Evergreen Studio，期間多次取得政府標案，並累積電商與多媒體製作的實戰經驗。同時是臺灣文學館登錄作家，獨立開發創新 app（如文學知識平臺與線上遺囑生成器），並創作原創音樂及影音內容。熱愛持續學習與創意內容開發，致力於讓科技與現實生活產生積極影響。個人專案涵蓋 SDGs 社區倡議（與夥伴協作）、獨立開發應用、腦機介面研究與特色產品設計，偶爾也會嘗試新食譜或烹飪創作，為生活增添一點樂趣。我相信科技與創意能讓生活變得更溫暖且有意義，無論是對團隊、用戶還是這個世界。

興趣與嗜好
閱讀、音樂製作、小提琴、神經科學與 AI 探索、獨立 app 開發、烹飪藝術、潛水，以及享受美食與冒險。

With over a decade of experience in project management, technical writing, and system development, I have managed projects for international brands such as Louis Vuitton and TITAN, and spent several years at IBM focusing on process management, internal tool development, and documentation. My expertise lies in workflow optimization, digital transformation, and resource integration—consistently helping teams achieve and surpass their goals. I hold certifications in Python programming, TOEIC Gold, Steinberg music production, Chinese culinary arts (Level C), and PADI Open Water Diver, blending technical depth with creativity and a passion for life. I am currently pursuing AWS Cloud certifications to further expand my skills.

Outside my core career, I founded Evergreen Studio, securing multiple government tenders and gaining hands-on experience in e-commerce and multimedia production. I am also a registered writer at the National Museum of Taiwan Literature, an independent app developer (including a literature knowledge platform and an online will generator), and a creator of original music and video content. I am passionate about continuous learning, creative content development, and leveraging technology for real-world impact. My side projects range from SDGs community initiatives (in collaboration with partners) to independent app development, BCI research, and unique product design. Occasionally, I experiment with new recipes or culinary creations to add a touch of joy to life. I believe technology and creativity can make life warmer and more meaningful—for teams, users, and the world.

Hobbies & Interests: Reading, music production, violin, neuroscience and AI exploration, indie app development, culinary arts, scuba diving, and enjoying good food and new adventures.
